attributes.action: IDENTIFY AND BRING TO TRIAL ANY PERSON(S) RESPONSIBLE FOR TAKING THE UK INTO ILLEGAL WAR
attributes.additional_details:
You have sent me the following reply to the epetition I submitted;
Dear John Michael Richards,

Your e-petition "IDENTIFY AND BRING TO TRIAL ANY PERSON(S) RESPONSIBLE FOR TAKING THE UK INTO ILLEGAL WAR" hasn't been accepted.

E-petitions will not be accepted if they:
 •contain offensive, joke or nonsense content
 •use language which may cause offence, is provocative or extreme in its views
 •use wording that is impossible to understand
 •include statements that amount to advertisements

If you'd like to submit a new e-petition, please read the site's terms and conditions which explain the rules in detail.

Thanks,

HM Government e-petitions

I do not agree that it does breach any of the above and sak you to advise in which way you believe ot does. There appears to be no other way of contact you other than this portal. If I have not had a full reply within seven days I will be obliged to raise the matter with my MP and the ombudsman service.
